noun.description: A white caustic alkaline substance consisting of calcium oxide, which is obtained by heating limestone and which combines with water with the production of much heat; quicklime.

verb.description: Treat (soil or water) with lime to reduce acidity and improve fertility or oxygen levels.

origin: Origin uncertain; said to be from Limey (because of the number of British sailors present during the Second World War), or from suck a lime, expressing bitterness at not being invited to a gathering.
